metadata.title: CVE-2020-35517 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in qemu. A host privilege escalation issue was found inthe virtio-fs shared file system daemon where a privileged guest user isable to create a device special file in the shared directory and use it tor/w access host devices.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
